ModMetaData.name: Machines Never Breakdown
ModMetaData.author: k2ymg
ModMetaData.description:
This mod just remove the breakable property from all machines.

This is almost same as [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1302867750]No Random Breakdown + No Random Shortcircruit[/url], but this still remain solar flare and short circuit incidents, and short circuit with rain.

(If you not want to solar flare and/or short circuit incidents, you can disable those in scenario editor.)

If your save have a broken machine already, it's automatically fixed. (In this case, if you have enabled debug mode, and a colonist trying fixed broken machines, it may couse an internal error, but it is not critical. You can continue game. (or cancel repaire task if you not want to wast a component.)
